headline.main: Study Shows Power Of Public-Service Ads

docs.lead_paragraph: In the advertising industry's first comprehensive study of public-service campaigns, researchers have found that television commercials can induce striking changes in people's behavior regarding health. The study lends strong support to the power of mainstream advertising, whose effectiveness has been challenged in recent years. Since the mid-1980's, consumer-product companies have been shifting money from print and broadcast advertising to price promotions, direct marketing and other marketing methods whose results are easier to judge.
